rules.description: Space2Hyper (Robust / Lazy)
Space2Hyper - All Letters and Digits [delayed]
Space2Hyper - All Letters and Digits
Space2Hyper - Space == caps_lock alternate
Control + Button1 to Command + Button1
Post escape if fn is pressed alone.
Right Command + Tab  Left Command + Tab [Switch Tabs using both hands]
command to mission_control if pressed alone
[MOD] right_command to left_control in iterm2|alacritty|terminal on Apple Internal Keyboard.
[MOD] right_command to control with pgUp/pgdown/arrows/tab (for Mac keyboard). [to fix?]
[MOD] right_control to right_command if not in iterm2|alacritty|terminal|firefox.
[forwarder] control to command shortcuts in firefox|chrome.
[NOOP] control + command + {left,right}_arrow (avoid control to command remap)
[ALL] left_control to escape when pressed alone.
[MOD] left_control to left_command if not in iTerm2|alacritty|terminal|firefox|chrome.
[terminal] left_control to escape when pressed alone.
Use [Option + Number] to [cmd + Number] Switch Tabs in Chrome & Firefox
[Slack] Fix Home and End key
Use [Option + Number] to [cmd + Number] Switch Tabs in Chrome & Firefox
[Finder] Delete key as 'Move to Trash'
Option + Number to control + number in Chrome, Brave & Firefox
Ctrl + Left Click to Left Click (fix right click; use a 2 buttons mouse)
Change right_shift + left_shift to caps_lock
rules.title: Change right_shift + left_shift to caps_lock
